name: The Ultimate Super Bowl Blue Cheese Dip
description: Try out this blue cheese dip recipe after reading my associated post: The Best Blue Cheese For the Ultimate Super Bowl Blue Cheese Dip....
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup (4 ounces) sour cream (or a strained yogurt like Labneh)

recipeInstructions.text: Gently beat together the cream cheese, the heavy cream, and the sour cream. (I used a food processor, but only pulsed it briefly; you could probably also use an electric mixer on a slow speed.) Add the crumbled cheese and the scallions and stir to mix, making sure to keep some of the crumbles intact.
